titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Minnesota Lynx women's basketball team on winning the 2013 Women's National Basketball Association Championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 11/14/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the Minnesota Lynx for winning the 2013 Women's National Basketball Association National Championship.
